summary: Diff implements a single-page responsive photography marketing site with navigation and sections for Home, About, Portfolio (with filters + lightbox), Pricing (3 tiers), Packages (accordion-style details), and Contact form with validation and local (sessionStorage) storage. However, it also adds unrequested Internet Identity/auth-related infrastructure and a backend actor stub, which are outside the BuildRequest/non-goals. Evidence for generated image files existing under frontend/public/assets/generated is not present in the readable diff (only UI references are shown).

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend Motoko actor stub despite no backend work being requested
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is entirely frontend-focused; backend changes were not requested (and non-goals include avoiding extra backend functionality unless explicitly requested).

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced Internet Identity/authentication-related provider and actor hook usage (React Query actor creation tied to identity)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists user accounts/authentication (Internet Identity) as a non-goal unless explicitly requested; the diff adds Internet Identity provider/hook code and an authenticated/anonymous actor creation flow.
